name: PSP Game Data File
summary: Learn about .JRZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: JRZ files can sometimes be found inside .CSO files, which are archives for the PSP. Since CSO files can be converted to .ISO disk images, you can extract the JRZ file after mounting the ISO file using a disk image utility.

description: Data file used by games for the PlayStation Portable (PSP), such as XSEED Games' Half-Minute Hero game; contains references to .VAG audio files; may also contain other game data; used for storing in-game content.
